title: Topical Investigations; Experiential Learning: Maryland, Public Policy and Beyond
description: Students interested in registering for this course must have an internship secured and must apply to the CAPC Internship Program; the application is available at the link below. Required in-person class meetings will take place 6:30pm - 9:15pm on the following Tuesdays: January 30th, March 6th, April 10th and May 1st.
